001import java.util.Stack;
002import java.util.Scanner;
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
005
006/**
007 * Game engine est le coeur du jeu il permet d'afficher les room, les textes du jeu et de faire tourner le jeu.
008 *
009 * @author 
010 * @version (un numÃ©ro de version ou une date)
011 */
012public class GameEngine
013{
014    private Parser        aParser;
015    private UserInterface aGui;
016    private Player aPlayer;
017    
018    /**
019     * Constructeur par dÃ©faut
020     */
021    public GameEngine() {
022        this.aParser = new Parser();
023        this.createRooms();    
024    }
025    /**
026     * Met en place l'interface graphique
027     */
028    public void setGui (final UserInterface pUserInterface) {
029        this.aGui=pUserInterface;
030        this.printWelcome();
031    }
032    /**
033     * Texte affichÃ© au du dÃ©but du jeu
034     */
035    private void printWelcome ()
036    {
037        this.aGui.println("Welcome to the Crossing!");
038        this.aGui.println("Your objective is to cross a forest without dying, if you do, you will restart at the biginning.");
039        
040        this.aGui.println("Type 'help' if you need help.");
041        this.aGui.print("\n");
042        this.aGui.println("You are in front of a forest then you need to cross !!");
043        this.aGui.println("Have a great time !");
044        this.printLocationInfo();
045    }
046    /**
047     * Initialisation des room, des chemins et des items. 
048     */
049    private void createRooms()
050    {
051        Room vSpawn, vDruid, vDruid2, vElf, vTrap, vGobelins, vDragon, vLandslide, vTroll, vEnd;
052         vSpawn = new Room (" at the entrance of the forest","Image/vSpawn.jpeg");
053         vDruid = new Room (" in a house and you see a staircase","Image/vDruid1.jpeg");
054         vDruid2 = new Room("in th laboratory of a druid","Image/vDruid2.jpeg");
055         vElf = new Room (" in front of an elf","Image/vElf.jpeg");
056         vTrap = new Room (" now in a trap","Image/vTrap.jpg");
057         vGobelins = new Room (" in front of a tribe of gobelins ","Image/vGobelins.jpeg");
058         vDragon = new Room (" in front now of a dragon","Image/vDragon.jpeg");
059         vLandslide = new Room (" in a dead end and many stones fall on you","Image/vLanslide.jpeg");
060         vTroll = new Room (" you are ina clearing and you have awakened a troll who now wants to attack you","Image/vTroll.jpeg");
061         vEnd = new Room (" at the end of the forest, you've won !!!!","Image/vEnd.jpeg");
062        /**Sorties pour chaque piÃ¨ce
063         * 
064         */
065        vSpawn.setExit("North",vElf);
066        vSpawn.setExit("South",vDruid);
067        vDruid.setExit("East",vGobelins);
068        vDruid.setExit("Up",vDruid2);
069        vDruid2.setExit("Down",vDruid);
070        vElf.setExit("North",vDragon);
071        vElf.setExit("South",vGobelins);
072        vElf.setExit("East",vTrap);
073        vTrap.setExit("Respawn",vSpawn);
074        vGobelins.setExit("South",vTroll);
075        vGobelins.setExit("East",vLandslide);
076        vLandslide.setExit("Respawn",vSpawn);
077        vGobelins.setExit("North",vElf);
078        vDragon.setExit("East",vEnd);
079        vTroll.setExit("East",vEnd);
080        
081        /*
082        vDruid2.getRandomizer().addRoom(vSpawn);
083        vDruid2.getRandomizer().addRoom(vDruid);
084        vDruid2.getRandomizer().addRoom(vGobelins);
085        vDruid2.getRandomizer().addRoom(vTroll);
086        */
087        
088        Item vPotion= new Item(" this potion is  very precious and will usefull later",0.100 );
089        Item vGlasses= new Item(" they have no use expect making you even more beautiful",0.02);
090        Beamer vHat=new Beamer(" this magnificent hat is useless",0.4);
091        Item magicCookie= new Item ("you can now transport more objects",0.0);
092        vDruid2.addItem("potion",vPotion);
093        vDruid2.addItem("glasses",vGlasses);
094        vSpawn.addItem("hat",vHat);
095        vElf.addItem("magiccookie",magicCookie);
096        
097        this.aPlayer = new Player("Gontrande",vSpawn); 
098        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vSpawn);
099        //Initialisation du jeu
100        
101    }
102    /**
103     * Interprete les commandes rentrÃ©s par le joueur et les interprÃ¨te
104     */
105    public void interpretCommand (final String pCommandLine){
106        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCommandLine );
107        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand( pCommandLine );
108        String vCommandWord=vCommand.getCommandWord();
109        if ( vCommand.isUnknown() ) {
110            this.aGui.println( "I don't know what you mean..." );
111            return;
112        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("go")){
113                this.goRoom(vCommand);
114                
115        }else if (vCommandWord.equals("quit")){
116                this.endGame();
117        }else if (vCommandWord.equals("help")){
118                this.printHelp();
119                
120        }else if(vCommandWord.equals("look")) {
121                this.look(vCommand);
122                
123        }else if(vCommandWord.equals("eat")) {
124            this.eat(vCommand);
125        
126        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("back")){
127            this.back(vCommand);
128        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("Respawn")) {
129            
130        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("test")) {
131            this.test(vCommand);
132        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("take")) {
133            this.take(vCommand);
134        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("drop")) {
135            this.drop(vCommand);
136        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("inventory")) {
137            this.inventory(vCommand);
138        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("charge")) {
139            this.charge(vCommand);
140        } else if (vCommandWord.equals("fire")) {
141            this.fire(vCommand);
142        }
143    }
144    
145    /**
146     * permet au joueur de charger le beamer
147     * @param pCommand
148     */
149    private void charge(final Command pCommand) {
150        if (!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
151            this.aGui.println("Charge what ?");
152            return;
153        }
154        
155        if (this.aPlayer.getInventory().getItem(pCommand.getSecondWord()).equals("null")) {
156            this.aGui.println("You don\'t have " + pCommand.getSecondWord());
157            return;
158        }
159        
160        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getInventory().getItem(pCommand.getSecondWord());
161        Beamer vBeamer = (Beamer) vItem;
162        
163        if (vBeamer.getBeamerState() == true) {
164            this.aGui.println("Beamer is already charged.");
165            return;
166        }
167        
168        vBeamer.charge(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
169        this.aGui.println("Beamer charged at : " + this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getShortDescription());
170    }
171    
172    /**
173     * permet au joueur de tirer le beamer
174     * @param pCommand
175     */
176    private void fire(final Command pCommand) {
177        if (!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
178            this.aGui.println("Charge what ?");
179            return;
180        }
181        
182        if (this.aPlayer.getInventory().getItem(pCommand.getSecondWord()).equals("null")) {
183            this.aGui.println("You don\'t have " + pCommand.getSecondWord());
184            return;
185        }
186        
187        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getInventory().getItem(pCommand.getSecondWord());
188        Beamer vBeamer = (Beamer) vItem;
189        
190        if (vBeamer.getBeamerState() == false) {
191            this.aGui.println("Beamer is not charged.");
192            return;
193        }
194        
195        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vBeamer.getSavedRoom());
196        this.printLocationInfo();
197        this.aGui.println("Beamer fired at : " + this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getShortDescription());
198        vBeamer.fire();
199    }
200    private void inventory(final Command pCommand) {
201        if (pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
202            return;
203        }
204        
205        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getInventory().getItemsString());
206        }
207    /**
208     * permet au joueur de prendre un item
209     */
210    private void take(final Command vCommand) {
211        if (!vCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
212            this.aGui.println("Take what?");
213            return;
214        }
215        String vItem = vCommand.getSecondWord();
216        
217        if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItem) != null) {
218            this.aPlayer.take(vItem);
219            this.aGui.println("You took " + vItem);
220        }     
221    }
222    /**
223     * permet au joueur de lacher un item
224     */
225    private void drop(final Command vCommand) {
226        String vItem = vCommand.getSecondWord();
227        
228        if (!this.aPlayer.getInventory().hasItem(vItem)) {
229            this.aGui.println("You don\'t have " + vItem + ".");
230            return;
231        }
232        if (this.aPlayer.getInventory() != null) {
233            this.aPlayer.drop(vItem);
234            this.aGui.println("You dropped " + vItem); 
235        }
236    }
237    /**
238     * permet de tester un ensemble de commande contenu dans un fichier .txt
239     */
240    private void test (final Command pCommand) {
241        if (!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
242            this.aGui.println("What do you want to test?");
243            return;
244        }
245        
246        String vFileToRead = pCommand.getSecondWord();
247        try {
248            Scanner vScan = new Scanner(new File("" + vFileToRead + ".txt"));
249            while (vScan.hasNextLine()) {
250                this.interpretCommand(vScan.nextLine());
251            }
252        } catch (final FileNotFoundException vE){
253            this.aGui.println("There is no such file of testing !");
254        }
255    }
256    private void look(final Command pCommand)
257    {
258        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());    
259    }
260    /**
261     * permet au joueur de manger
262     */
263    private void eat(final Command pCommand) {
264        if(!pCommand.hasSecondWord()) {
265           return;
266        } 
267        
268        if (!this.aPlayer.getInventory().hasItem(pCommand.getSecondWord())) {
269            return;
270        }
271        
272        String vItem = pCommand.getSecondWord();
273        this.aPlayer.eat(vItem);
274        this.aGui.println("You ate " + vItem);
275        if (vItem.equals("magiccookie")) {
276            this.aGui.println("Capacity has been * 2");    
277        }
278    }
279    /**
280     * fait passer le joueur d'une room Ã  l'autre
281     */
282    private void goRoom(final Command pCommand)
283    {
284        if ( ! pCommand.hasSecondWord() ) {
285            // if there is no second word, we don't know where to go...
286            this.aGui.println( "Go where?" );
287            return;
288        }
289
290        String vDirection = pCommand.getSecondWord();
291
292        // Try to leave current room.
293        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit( vDirection );
294        //this.aGui.println(this.backRoom.getShortDescription());
295        if ( vNextRoom == null )
296            this.aGui.println( "There is no path!" );
297        else if (this.aPlayer.getRemainingMoves() <= 0) {
298            this.aGui.println("No moves remaining");
299            this.endGame();
300        } else if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getClass().equals(TransporterRoom.class)) {
301            Room vRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom();
302            TransporterRoom vTRoom = (TransporterRoom) vRoom;
303            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vTRoom.getRandomizer().getRoom());
304            this.printLocationInfo();
305        } else {
306            this.aPlayer.goRoom(vDirection);
307            this.printLocationInfo();
308        }
309        
310    }
311    /**
312     * affiche le texte pour aider le joueur ainsi que toutes les commandes disponibles
313     */
314    private void printHelp ()
315    {
316        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.");
317        this.aGui.println("You wander around in the forest."+ "\n");
318        this.aGui.println("Your commands are :" + this.aParser.getCommandString());
319    }
320    /**
321     * permet d'arreter de jouer
322     */
323    private void endGame() {
324        this.aGui.println("Thank you for playing. Have a nice day !!");
325        this.aGui.enable( false );
326    }
327    /**
328     * affiche la description de la room dans laquelle le joueur arrive
329     */
330    public void printLocationInfo(){
331        this.aGui.println(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription());
332        if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null)
333            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
334    }
335    /**
336     * permet de revenir Ã  la room prÃ©cÃ©dente
337     */
338    private void back(final Command pCommand){
339        if(this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoomStack().isEmpty()){
340            return;
341        }
342        if (pCommand.hasSecondWord()){
343            this.aGui.println("You can't back in a particular place !");
344            return; //Arret prÃ©maturÃ©
345        }
346        if (!this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoomStack().peek().isExit()) {
347            this.aGui.println("You can't go back. It\'s a trap !");
348            return;
349        }
350        this.aPlayer.back();
351        this.printLocationInfo();
352    }
353}
